Package fr.sii.ogham.testing.extension.spring

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GreenMailInitializer
    Initializer for Spring Boot tests that registers: "greenmail.smtp.port" property in Spring Environment GreenMailRule bean in Spring ApplicationContext through GreenMailTestConfiguration in order to use the port defined by "greenmail.smtp.port" property
    GreenMailTestConfiguration
    Test configuration that registers: GreenMailRule bean for JUnit 4 GreenMailExtension bean for JUnit 5 Configure port defined by greenmail.smtp.port property.
    JsmppServerInitializer
    Initializer for Spring Boot tests that registers: "jsmpp.server.port" property in Spring Environment JsmppServerRule bean in Spring ApplicationContext through JsmppServerTestConfiguration in order to use the port defined by "jsmpp.server.port" property
    JsmppServerTestConfiguration
    Test configuration that registers: JsmppServerRule bean for JUnit 4 JsmppServerExtension bean for JUnit 5 Configure port defined by jsmpp.server.port property.
    WireMockInitializer
    Initializer for Spring Boot tests that registers: "wiremock.server.port" property in Spring Environment WireMockRule bean in Spring ApplicationContext through WireMockTestConfiguration in order to use the port defined by "wiremock.server.port" property
    WireMockTestConfiguration
    Test configuration that registers WireMockRule bean with port defined by wiremock.server.port property.
